videos.description: Kentucky QB Stephen Johnson calls his own number and scores the first points of the game, putting Kentucky up 7-0 vs Southern Mississippi.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kentucky takes lead on QB sneak) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kentucky takes lead on QB sneak

videos.description: Stephen Johnson finds C.J. Conrad for a 23-yard touchdown, putting Kentucky ahead of Southern Miss 14-3 in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kentucky extends lead with 23-yard TD) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kentucky extends lead with 23-yard TD

videos.description: Southern Mississippi chips away at the deficit early in the third quarter with Kwadra Griggs' 42-yard TD pass to Korey Robertson.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Southern Mississippi starts off third quarter with TD) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Southern Mississippi starts off third quarter with TD

videos.description: Darius West's hit on Southern Mississippi QB Kwadra Giggs causes him to fumble and Denzil Ware scoops it up to take it to the house.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Kentucky pads lead on a scoop-and-score) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kentucky pads lead on a scoop-and-score

videos.description: Korey Robertson shows impressive effort on a fourth-quarter TD reception for Southern Miss.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Southern Miss breaking tackles for TD) 2017/09/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Southern Miss breaking tackles for TD
